sql.content:
select id, is_major_version, subversion, signature, state from bpm_re_procdef where code = #{code} and version = #{version} and is_major_subversion=1
and tenant_id = #{tenantId}

update bpm_re_procdef set subversion= subversion+1 where code = #{code} and version = #{version} and subversion >= #{subversion, dataType=number}
and tenant_id = #{tenantId}

select id from bpm_re_procdef where is_major_version=1 and code = #{code}
and tenant_id = #{tenantId}

select id, type_id, is_major_version, subversion, state from bpm_re_procdef where is_major_subversion=1 and code = #{code} and version = #{version}
and tenant_id = #{tenantId}
